title: ***#1 EXCELLENT APT. BALCONY. PRIVATE 1 CAR GARAGE 2BR/2BA***
posting_body: ['Excellent Apartment.', 'Balcony.', 'Private garage.', 'Lower unit in 3 plex.', 'Ready to move in.', 'Call for appointment.', 'We are a family run business.', 'We have been in Richmond for over 30 years.', 'We have built every property, run and lease all units.', 'Our handy man has been with us for 20 years and is excellent.', 'We over see our properties like a well-run community where everyone knows each other.', 'You are an amazing addition to the community, not a number in a file.', 'Communication is key and we are available 24/7.', 'We look forward to you becoming a wonderful new addition to our wonderful community.', 'Have a blessed day.', 'This unit is Excellent and Ready to move in ASAP', 'Rent $2500', 'Deposit $2500', 'GREAT VIEWS', '1 CAR GARAGE PRIVATE', 'Call for an appointment', 'Immediate Move Ready to go', 'Make this your NEW HAPPY HOME', 'MOVE IN ASAP', 'Unit all ready for you', 'Excellent tenants in complex.', '******OPEN House CALL FOR APPOINTMENT******', '****5121 Fresno Avenue Unit B Richmond Annex, CA 94804****', 'Great APARTMENT', '**CATS ALLOWED*', '* Pet deposit required', 'Excellent TWO bedroom TWO bath apartment', 'PRIVATE Garage', '1150 sq.ft.', 'Apartment has Dishwasher, Disposal, Range and Refrigerator', '2 large bedrooms 2 bath', 'NEW PAINT NEW LIGHTS NEW BLINDS NEW CARPET', 'Full time maintenance staff for all your needs', '1/4 Mile to Point Isabela Dog Park and Costco', 'Very easy access to freeway 580 and 80', 'Water and Garbage are paid by owner', 'Less than 1 Mile to BART', 'Coin operated Laundry machines on site', '10 feet from front door.', 'Water and Garbage paid by owner', 'Rent, PG&E and Cable paid by tenant.', 'Owner built, owned and operated.', 'Call Anthony', 'show contact info']
